products.title: Heavy Primal Rope
products.summary: Build explosive power and rotational strength with sustainable training methods.
products.description: The Heavy Primal Rope delivers full-body power and conditioning through flow-based movement patterns. Perfect for athletes seeking intense training that builds resilience without excessive wear and tear.

products.title: Flow Training Guide
products.summary: Master sustainable movement patterns for long-term strength and performance.
products.description: This comprehensive guide teaches flow-based training methods that build strength, mobility, and resilience. Learn how to train smarter, recover better, and maintain peak performance for years to come.
